file.body:
/* header */
hda - symbols in the toparea
ID of the Alumnipage.
ID of the servicedesk (SD) page. Servicedesk: ID der Seite mit dem Service-Desk iFrame
If it's true, shows the hda-icon for linking to the h-da.de
ID of the internal services page Intern: ID der Seite Intern.
The serif-font
Stylesheet sets
/* -- Color ------------------------- */
Top-area - border color (default transparent) Top-Border Farbe (Vorgabe transparent)
Top-area - border height (default 8) Indexed_search Scss-Datei einbinden (empty = inaktiv)
Icons background color (Icon Area)
Li-elements backgroundcolor
Top-area - border height (default 0)
Links and wraps in the Basicfooterline
/* -- ICONS ------------------------ */
Width of the icons in the footerarea
Location of the icons. Must part of the filesystem (fileadmin), because FAL is needed. Files need meta information "alt" and "source".
Activate the icons in the footer
Activate the icons in the header
/* -- SCSS ------------------------ */
Including the indexed_search-scss (default empty, not activ) Indexed_search Scss-Datei einbinden (empty = inaktiv)
Including the scsss for the powermail Powermailmodifierung (empty = inaktiv)
Including the jpfaq-scss (default empty, not activ) Jpfaq Scss-Datei einbinden (empty = inaktiv)
